CreateObject: INSERT INTO STATUSES (ID, CREATED, STATUS, OPERATIONAL, FK_DRONEID) VALUES (@ID, @CREATED, @STATUS, @OPERATIONAL, @FK_DRONEID)
ReadObject: SELECT ID, CREATED, STATUS, OPERATIONAL, FK_DRONEID DRONEID FROM STATUSES WHERE ID = @ID
UpdateObject: UPDATE STATUSES SET CREATED = @CREATED, STATUS = @STATUS, OPERATIONAL = @OPERATIONAL, FK_DRONEID = @FK_DRONEID WHERE ID = @ID
ReadStatusIds: SELECT ID FROM STATUSES WHERE FK_DRONEID = @ID
